author: Andrew Allentuck
title: This Ontario man may have to delay retirement after coronavirus crash wipes out 20% of his investments
description: Though Chuck is extremely frugal and has no debts, the loss from the crash will take a significant bite out of his retirement income
content: A man we’ll call Chuck lives in Ontario. Now 50, he wants to retire at the age of 55.  An engineer, he takes home $6,500 per month. He has no spouse, no children and no debts. Frugal, he has accumulated about $1.18 million in stocks in a variety of RRSPs, a T… [+5099 chars]
